title: Heterogeneous Entity Matching with Complex Attribute Associations using BERT and Neural Networks. (arXiv:2309.11046v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Across various domains, data from different sources such as Baidu Baike and Wikipedia often manifest in distinct forms. Current entity matching methodologies predominantly focus on homogeneous data, characterized by attributes that share the same structure and concise attribute values. However, this orientation poses challenges in handling data with diverse formats. Moreover, prevailing approaches aggregate the similarity of attribute values between corresponding attributes to ascertain entity similarity. Yet, they often overlook the intricate interrelationships between attributes, where one attribute may have multiple associations. The simplistic approach of pairwise attribute comparison fails to harness the wealth of information encapsulated within entities.To address these challenges, we introduce a novel entity matching model, dubbed Entity Matching Model for Capturing Complex Attribute Relationships(EMM-CCAR),built upon pre-trained models. Specifically, this model transforms the m

Title: Heterogeneous Entity Matching with Complex Attribute Associations using BERT and Neural Networks. (arXiv:2309.11046v1 [cs.CL])
Abstract: Across various domains, data from different sources such as Baidu Baike and Wikipedia often manifest in distinct forms. Current entity matching methodologies predominantly focus on homogeneous data, characterized by attributes that share the same structure and concise attribute values. However, this orientation poses challenges in handling data with diverse formats. Yet, they often overlook the intricate interrelationships between attributes, where one attribute may have multiple associations. translated_title: 使用BERT和神经网络进行复杂属性关联的异构实体匹配
translated_abstract: 在各个领域中，来自百度百科和维基百科等不同来源的数据通常呈现出不同的形式。目前的实体匹配方法主要集中在同质化数据上，其特点是属性具有相同的结构和简洁的属性值。然而，这种取向在处理具有多样化格式的数据时面临挑战。此外，目前的方法主要通过聚合相应属性之间的属性值相似度来确定实体相似度，但往往忽视了属性之间复杂的相互关系，其中一个属性可能具有多种关联。简单的逐对属性比较方法无法充分利用实体中所蕴含的丰富信息。为了解决这些挑战，我们引入了一种新颖的实体匹配模型，称为基于BERT和神经网络捕捉复杂属性关系的实体匹配模型（EMM-CCAR），它构建在预训练模型的基础上。
tldr: 使用BERT和神经网络构建了一种新颖的实体匹配模型，能够处理具有不同格式和复杂属性关联的异构实体数据。
